trans-unit.resname: M12·1 | Aegis Angel | Card Name
M12·1 | Aegis Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

trans-unit.resname: M12·1 | Aegis Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control CARDNAME. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

M12·2 | Alabaster Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1

M12·195 | Skinshifter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
{G}: Choose one. Activate only once each turn.
• Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a Rhino with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains trample.
• Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a Bird with base power and toughness 2/2 and gains flying.
• Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a Plant with base power and toughness 0/8.
trans-unit.target: {G}：选择一项～直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为4/4犀牛且获得践踏异能；或直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为2/2鸟且获得飞行异能；或直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为0/8植物。 此异能每回合中只能起动一次。
